description: This file defines the BoardView widget and related subwidgets for rendering a 2048 game board with animated tiles in a Flutter application. It handles layout, tile animation effects, and visual styling specific to the game.

classes.name: BoardView
classes.description: A widget that renders a 4x4 game board with animated tiles, adapting to available size.

classes.name: _GridBackground
classes.description: A widget that renders the static background grid for the game board cells.

classes.name: _TilesLayer
classes.description: A widget that layers animated tiles on top of the background grid, managing their positions and order.

classes.name: _AnimatedTile
classes.description: A widget that handles spawn and merge animations for individual tiles.

classes.name: _TileView
classes.description: A widget that displays a single tile with styling based on its value.

classes.name: _TileColors
classes.description: A helper class providing color schemes based on tile values.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree, including layout, background, and tiles, based on current game board state.

methods.name: _extractTiles
methods.description: Extracts all non-null tiles from the board for rendering.

methods.name: _playSpawn
methods.description: Triggers spawn animation for new tiles.

methods.name: _scheduleMergePop
methods.description: Triggers bounce animation for tiles that are merging.
